question: What is the most profitable route based on average booking price in 2024?
query:
SELECT f.departure_airport || '-' || f.arrival_airport AS route,
       AVG(b.price) AS avg_price
FROM postgres_air.booking b
JOIN postgres_air.booking_leg bl ON b.booking_id = bl.booking_id
JOIN postgres_air.flight f ON bl.flight_id = f.flight_id
WHERE b.price IS NOT NULL
  AND f.scheduled_departure >= '2024-01-01'
  AND f.scheduled_departure < '2025-01-01'
GROUP BY f.departure_airport, f.arrival_airport
ORDER BY avg_price DESC
LIMIT 1;
